mapper.select: select d.donate_no as donateNo, d.member_no as memberNo, d.donate_organ as donateOrgan, d.donate_content as donateContent, d.donate_sum as donateSum, d.donate_img as donateImg, d.donate_end as donateEnd, m.member_mileage as memberMileage from donate d join member m on d.member_no = m.member_no order by donate_no asc
